title: Voice message can't play thru car's bluetooth
content: I have a Pixel 2 XL, and my car is 15 MDX, I have no issue connecting to my car via bluetooth, calling, music streaming are working perfectly, but when it comes to the social app called"Wechat", we always communicate with voice message, after phone is connect to the BT, the voice message can't play thru the car's speaker, after I tap the voice message, my car's infotainment system will pop up a same box as when I make calls, but it is silence. Anyone has a solution to this?
